column1: Kata Robata////I always try to order a few things from the daily specials menu. This last time
column2: we tried a hamachi crudo with roasted tomato powder topped with mushrooms and it was fantastic. Their sushi specials are always great as well. If you look around in the restaurant
column3: you'll see that a lot of people order the spicy ramen. There really isn't a thing on the menu here that I dislike
column4: and the ramen is no exception. The only downside (if you can call it that) is that the ramen portion is HUGE. So you can order one and share
column5: but then that means you'll be too full to try anything else :(
